meals.name: Cheesecake
meals.description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, served on a crumbly biscuit base.

meals.name: Sushi Roll
meals.description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls including California, Spicy Tuna, and Eel Avocado.

meals.name: Osso Ramen
meals.description: A warming bowl of ramen with miso broth, tender pork, soft-boiled egg, and green onions.

meals.name: Romaine Spaghetti
meals.description: Al dente spaghetti with a creamy sauce made from egg yolk, pecorino cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

meals.name: Continental  Burger
meals.description: A juicy veggie patty served on a whole grain bun with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy sauce.

meals.name: Chicken Sandwich
meals.description: Tender grilled chicken breast with avocado, bacon, lettuce, and honey mustard on a toasted bun.

meals.name: Sizzler Steak
meals.description: Succulent steak cooked to your preference, served with crispy golden fries and herb butter.

meals.name: Falafel Fish Fillet
meals.description: Crispy falafels wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, and a tahini sauce.

meals.name: Chicken Ratatouille
meals.description: Tender pieces of chicken simmered in a rich and aromatic curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

meals.name: Buddha Veghan Bowl
meals.description: A hearty bowl filled with quinoa, roasted veggies, avocado, and a tahini dressing.

meals.name: Lobster Seafood
meals.description: A Spanish delicacy filled with saffron-infused rice, shrimp, mussels, and chorizo.

meals.name: Mignon Pancake
meals.description: Fluffy pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh berries.

meals.name: Classic Salad
meals.description: Romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with croutons and parmesan shavings.

meals.name: Beef Steak
meals.description: Three soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, fresh salsa, cheese, and sour cream.

meals.name: Chocolate Brownie
meals.description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

meals.name: Lobster Bisque
meals.description: A creamy soup made from lobster stock, aromatic vegetables, and a touch of brandy.

meals.name: Risotto Mushroom
meals.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with a medley of wild mushrooms and finished with parmesan.

meals.name: Parmesan Eggplant
meals.description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.

meals.name: Cheese
meals.description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

meals.name: French Pizza
meals.description: A classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin and crispy crust.
